entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 this morning then steady.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Amount 5 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 2 this morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 25 December 2022
